Some research indicate nicotine enhance certain aspect attention memory human . However , research need determine nicotine affect different element brain 's ability pay attention . Knowing aspect attention affect nicotine may help produce new medication therapy help people successfully stop smoking . DOC.detailed_description: Objective : The primary objective study investigate dose-related effect nicotine various element attention smoker nonsmoker . Because publish study , knowledge , report effect nicotine ANT ABT , include CPT , task show sensitive nicotine , positive control . A secondary aim compare subjective physiological effect nicotine smoker nonsmoker . Study Population : 50 smoker total 30 completers ( 15 woman , 15 men ) 50 nonsmoker total 30 completers ( 15 woman , 15 men ) . Design : Placebo-controlled , between-groups comparison smoker nonsmoker . Participants attend three experiemental session ; single dose nicotine nasal spray ( 0 , 0.5 , 1.5 mg ) administer session . Outcome Measures : Primary outcome measure accuracy and/or response time three attention test , ANT , CPT , ABT . Secondary outcome measure include response PANAS , VAS item , vital sign ( heart rate blood pressure ) . Participant demographic smoke history report use descriptive statistic .
